name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector - Sweep Detection, All Metal, Tone and Full Discriminate Modes

reviews.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector with Ground Trac
reviews.reviewText: purchased for 8 year old, researched all reviews before i bought. For the money this is the best metal detector out there. If you learn how to fine tune it - it will not register junk and hits only what you want. We tuned it to find only gold (have to test the settings with a piece of your own) Wow it was spot on ignoring wire, nails, copper and just finds gold.
reviews.title: best on the web

reviews.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector with Ground Trac
reviews.reviewText:
I purchased this product to find screws, nails, etc. left on the ground by the builders who had put up a new roof. I own livestock which had access to the yard where the roof was built. I also wanted to check a driveway as well.

I cannot comment on its ability to discern between junk and valuable items. I had the sensitivity set high to catch all metal.

It was light and easy to use. It found over 5 pounds of screws and small pieces of metal in an area where the naked eye saw none. Though they did not advertise it for this purpose, I was also able to locate and map a propane line which was buried about 2' down.
reviews.title: Non-Recreational Use

reviews.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector with Ground Trac
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking for a metal detector for a while with no luck. Then I found this model at Walmart.com. It was exactly what I wanted; very lightweight and easy to use, and it even has a headphone jack. Perfect for someone who just wants to “treasure hunt” for fun. Great for young and old alike.
reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!

reviews.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector with Ground Trac
reviews.reviewText: Within 5 minutes of my first use, I found a quarter! I'm on my way to making back my investment!! HA! I am pleased with how simple the instructions are and they actually work! Someone listened to the customer!
reviews.title: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV

reviews.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker IV Metal Detector with Ground Trac
reviews.reviewText: After reading several reviews of many different detectors, I decided on this one. First of all, it came over a week sooner than expected, which was a pleasant surprise, and I did not upgrade shipping. I also took another reviewers' advice and got the headphones as well, which were worth the extra costs. And finally, I put it together and went hunting for my wedding band that had been lost for about 8 months or so out near our trampoline (easy to figure out how I lost it...). It wasn't 45 minutes later I had found a missing wrench (used to put together the trampoline) and my wedding band! Not a week earlier we had priced out what it would cost to get a new band, pretty much giving up on finding the original. We will use this on the beach this coming summer down in Wildwood Crest. Again, great product, money well spent.
reviews.title: Great Product
